Uses of Package
org.springframework.util.concurrent

Packages that use org.springframework.util.concurrent
Package
Description
org.springframework.core.task
This package defines Spring's core TaskExecutor abstraction, and provides SyncTaskExecutor and SimpleAsyncTaskExecutor implementations.
org.springframework.core.task.support
Support classes for Spring's TaskExecutor abstraction.
org.springframework.util.concurrent
Useful generic java.util.concurrent.Future extensions.
  • Classes in org.springframework.util.concurrent used by org.springframework.core.task
    Class
    Description
    ListenableFuture
    Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    as of 6.0, in favor of CompletableFuture
